Social Impact

Social Impact Consulting Social Enterprises Ecosystem Builders

Benetech

Location: Palo Alto, CA

https://benetech.org/

An organization that harness the power of software and data to empower communities. Benetech uses software applications and data solutions to make education accessible, protect the environment, defend human rights, and level the playing field of community members. Benetech uses technology to bring about social justice by bridging social sector with Silicon Valley.

Kiva

Location: San Francisco, CA

https://www.kiva.org/

Kiva is an international non-profit that has a mission to expand financial access to underserved communities by crowdfunding loans and unlocking capital.

Khan Academy

Location: San Jose, CA

https://www.khanacademy.org/

A nonprofit social enterprise with a goal to help education people through the creation of online tools and videos. Khan Academy has a mission to provide free, world-class education for anyone and anywhere. It empowers students to learn in their own pace in and out of the classroom.
